data.text:
――A few days later. The day that Sakura Laurel 
would run in a selection race had arrived.
data.processed:
<story>――A few days later. The day that Sakura Laurel 
<story>would run in a selection race had arrived.

data.text:
Hey, Laurel. 
How unexpected. You're participating.
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Hey, Laurel. 
<story>How unexpected. You're participating.

data.text:
Ah, Hishi Ama-chan, I was looking forward to today♪ 
I plan on winning against Hishi Ama-chan!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Ah, Hishi Ama-chan, I was looking forward to today♪ 
<story>I plan on winning against Hishi Ama-chan!

data.text:
Hahaha, you've said it now. Are your legs fine? 
Either way, bring it on!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Hahaha, you've said it now. Are your legs fine? 
<story>Either way, bring it on!

data.text:
Mumumu, so her opponent is Hishi Ama-san. 
She'll be quite the foe……
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Mumumu, so her opponent is Hishi Ama-san. 
<story>She'll be quite the foe……

data.text:
That's true…… If it becomes battle of endurance, 
it doesn't look like she'll have a chance……
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>That's true…… If it becomes battle of endurance, 
<story>it doesn't look like she'll have a chance……

data.text:
Yes…… Just like you saw before, Laurel-san's running 
places a huge burden on her legs. And because of that……
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Yes…… Just like you saw before, Laurel-san's running 
<story>places a huge burden on her legs. And because of that……

data.text:
If she goes past her limits, she won't be able to last. 
Against someone like Hishi Ama-san, who could keep up 
with that Brian-san, an endurance battle is……
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>If she goes past her limits, she won't be able to last. 
<story>Against someone like Hishi Ama-san, who could keep up 
<story>with that Brian-san, an endurance battle is……

data.text:
That opponent from her previous match had also come to watch. 
――Narita Brian.
data.processed:
<story>That opponent from her previous match had also come to watch. 
<story>――Narita Brian.

data.text:
She probably came to observe but, it was likely that―― 
she didn't even notice Sakura Laurel.
data.processed:
<story>She probably came to observe but, it was likely that―― 
<story>she didn't even notice Sakura Laurel.

data.text:
(So Brian-chan……came to watch…… 
I want to show her my run……!)
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>(So Brian-chan……came to watch…… 
<story>I want to show her my run……!)

data.text:
(I've done all I can to prepare. But, to win decisively 
against Hishi Ama-chan, I'll need one more push……)
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>(I've done all I can to prepare. But, to win decisively 
<story>against Hishi Ama-chan, I'll need one more push……)

data.text:
Eh……is it……raining? 
I did think the clouds looked a little dark but……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Eh……is it……raining? 
<story>I did think the clouds looked a little dark but……

data.text:
Hmph, looks like things will be a bit troublesome. 
The clouds are really thin so it should stop soon but……
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Hmph, looks like things will be a bit troublesome. 
<story>The clouds are really thin so it should stop soon but……

data.text:
When the turf is wet, the ground gets slippery. 
Laurel, you should be careful too.
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>When the turf is wet, the ground gets slippery. 
<story>Laurel, you should be careful too.

data.text: I'll be――just fine♪
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>I'll be――just fine♪

data.text:
After all, my running is a little unusual. When you're soaring 
through the skies, it doesn't matter what the ground is like♪
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>After all, my running is a little unusual. When you're soaring 
<story>through the skies, it doesn't matter what the ground is like♪

data.text: Laurel……? That's right, your form is……
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed: <story>Laurel……? That's right, your form is……

data.text:
――It was a sliver of hope. If the turf was wet, 
then it would be difficult to get traction……
data.processed:
<story>――It was a sliver of hope. If the turf was wet, 
<story>then it would be difficult to get traction……

data.text:
On the other hand, for Sakura Laurel, since she 
has more vertical force in her running style……
data.processed:
<story>On the other hand, for Sakura Laurel, since she 
<story>has more vertical force in her running style……

data.text:
Well then, in the Selection race―― 
I'm looking forward to it Hishi Ama-chan!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Well then, in the Selection race―― 
<story>I'm looking forward to it Hishi Ama-chan!

data.text:
And so, in that light shower…… 
Sakura Laurel began her Selection race to chase her dream.
data.processed:
<story>And so, in that light shower…… 
<story>Sakura Laurel began her Selection race to chase her dream.

data.text:
Tch, it really is slippery. 
But this won't be enough to break me!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Tch, it really is slippery. 
<story>But this won't be enough to break me!

data.text:
Showing determination in any situation, that's me, 
Hishi Ama Nee-san! Deiyaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Showing determination in any situation, that's me, 
<story>Hishi Ama Nee-san! Deiyaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
A-as expected of Hishi Ama-san! 
She can still run like that with these course conditions……
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>A-as expected of Hishi Ama-san! 
<story>She can still run like that with these course conditions……

data.text:
It seemed like the battle was already over. 
However――
data.processed:
<story>It seemed like the battle was already over. 
<story>However――

data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>――!?

data.text: Taaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Taaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
Whaaaat!? Laurel!? 
What's with this speed……?
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Whaaaat!? Laurel!? 
<story>What's with this speed……?

data.text:
You're this unaffected by these conditions!? 
No, it's not just this. This running style……!!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>You're this unaffected by these conditions!? 
<story>No, it's not just this. This running style……!!

data.text:
(Right, this is what it looks like when I run seriously, 
Hishi Ama-chan. And also――Brian-chan!!)
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>(Right, this is what it looks like when I run seriously, 
<story>Hishi Ama-chan. And also――Brian-chan!!)

data.text:
(This run, I want to show it to someone who's 
chasing the same dream as me! If I win, then……! 
Just a little more, just a little more……!)
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>(This run, I want to show it to someone who's 
<story>chasing the same dream as me! If I win, then……! 
<story>Just a little more, just a little more……!)

data.text: Yaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Yaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
Laureeeeeel!!!!! 
I won't lose!
data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed:
<story>Laureeeeeel!!!!! 
<story>I won't lose!

data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>――!?

data.name: Hishi Amazon
data.processed: <story>Eh…………?

data.text:
――The race result. Hishi Amazon was first. 
And――
data.processed:
<story>――The race result. Hishi Amazon was first. 
<story>And――

data.text:
Sakura Laurel was unable to finish. 
As the rain stopped……so did Sakura Laurel……
data.processed:
<story>Sakura Laurel was unable to finish. 
<story>As the rain stopped……so did Sakura Laurel……

data.text:
Fuu-, how unfortunate. This is……my limit. 
I see, with my legs like this, even finishing is……
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Fuu-, how unfortunate. This is……my limit. 
<story>I see, with my legs like this, even finishing is……

data.text:
Trainer-san…… Yes, I stopped because it seemed like 
I was at my limit. Pushing myself now, and being 
unable to chase after my important dream, won't do.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san…… Yes, I stopped because it seemed like 
<story>I was at my limit. Pushing myself now, and being 
<story>unable to chase after my important dream, won't do.

data.text:
Her running, and even her stopping, was all 
for her dream. It seemed like Sakura Laurel 
was weighed down by thinking about her legs.
data.processed:
<story>Her running, and even her stopping, was all 
<story>for her dream. It seemed like Sakura Laurel 
<story>was weighed down by thinking about her legs.

data.text:
It was finally an opportunity to run with all her might. 
Just what was the dream that she wanted to fulfill that 
would make her hold herself back like this?

choices.text: Sakura Laurel, what is your dream……?
Sakura Laurel, what is your dream……?

data.processed:
<story>It was finally an opportunity to run with all her might. 
<story>Just what was the dream that she wanted to fulfill that 
<story>would make her hold herself back like this?

data.text: Eh, what's my――dream?
data.name: Sakura Laurel

choices.text: Yeah, I really want to know
Yeah, I really want to know

data.processed: <story>Eh, what's my――dream?

data.text:
Thank you very much. 
As lackluster as I am, if you're willing to listen.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Thank you very much. 
<story>As lackluster as I am, if you're willing to listen.

data.text: My dream is……Look, over there.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>My dream is……Look, over there.

data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>――?

data.text: The direction she was pointing――was at Narita Brian.
data.processed: <story>The direction she was pointing――was at Narita Brian.

data.text: No, my dream is――further beyond that.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>No, my dream is――further beyond that.

data.text: I was able to……see it today. Fufuu.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>I was able to……see it today. Fufuu.

data.text:
Beyond Narita Brian. 
There was――
data.processed:
<story>Beyond Narita Brian. 
<story>There was――

data.text: A rainbow……
data.processed: <story>A rainbow……

data.text: ――A rainbow after the rain had stopped.
data.processed: <story>――A rainbow after the rain had stopped.
